thread.title: Wednesday on Snapchat: Touring the New Photo-Friendly White House
thread.title_full: Wednesday on Snapchat: Touring the New Photo-Friendly White House

author: THE NEW YORK TIMES
title: Wednesday on Snapchat: Touring the New Photo-Friendly White House
text: Earlier this summer, Michelle Obama announced the end of a longtime ban on photography during public tours of the White House. With this in mind, we asked our politics reporter Nicholas Corasaniti to go put on his tourist hat. See what he sees on Wednesday morning, starting around 8:30 a.m. Eastern, as he makes a Snapchat story live on The New York Times Snapchat (username: thenytimes). You never know who might pop in to say hello. You can also get updates on Twitter at @NYTnickc and @nytimestravel.
